document.full_text: now that a brood of seven goslings has hatched at a buffalo cemetery, a deer that stood guard over their expectant single mother for weeks is beginning to wander off, a wildlife official said on thursday.
document.title: deer who stood guard over nest admires chicks with mother goose
lines_and_colors: now that a brood of seven goslings has hatched at a buffalo cemetery, a deer that stood guard over their expectant single mother for weeks is beginning to wander off, a wildlife official said on thursday.
